entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 1:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: SSE 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
